page.title: 16Wild flowers, Craignish.
page.content:
Observed (within or just beyond the N.W square of block) during the six weeks July to mid-August, 1981:-
Bog Asphodel, Sea Aster, Lady's Bed- straw, Buttercup, Red & White Campion, Charlock, Red & White Clover, Cotton- grass, Daisy, Dog Rose, Yellow Flag, Foxglove (also White), Forget-me-not, Fuchsia, Grass of Parnassus, Hardheads, Heartsease, Heather, Herb Bennet, Hogweed, Honeysuckle, Lady's Smock, Purple Loosestrife, Marjoram, Meadowsweet, Monkey-flower, Monkshood, Moss Campion, Nipplewort, Orchid (Butterfly & Pyramidal), Orpine, Ox-eye Daisy,Ragged Robin, Rosebay Willowherb, Scabious (Field), Self-heal, Silverweed, Sorrel, Speedwell, Stonecrop, Thrift, Vetch, Water Mint,Yellow Rattle.
